user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my colleague who is a big fan of Donald Trump. Can you help me gather some information about upcoming election events related to the Republican party? It would be great if you could also provide me with news about pollution in African countries from a specific news source.

TaskList.description: Gather information about upcoming election events related to the Republican party.
Retrieve news articles about pollution in African countries from a specific news source.
Compile and organize gathered information about election events and pollution news for presentation.
